title: 310: Breaking the Good Girl Myth with Majo Molfino
itunes:title: 310: Breaking the Good Girl Myth with Majo Molfino
description:
In life, as women we’ve been taught to behave a certain way for approval, acceptance and favorability. We’ve been told to be nice, selfless, devoted, the perfect wife. Not too loud, not too opinionated, not too intelligent. Well all of that was patriarchal BS. In this episode, I sit down with author Majo to discuss the five good girl myths that are holding us back and how to reclaim our full sovereignty. I also share the good girl myth I fell under and how I overcame it.

Tap into your heart, your joy and your dharma this month with the frequency of Lemuria in Rose Gold Goddesses. Available on its own at rosegoldgoddesses.com/lemuria or as part of your membership at www.RoseGoldGoddesses.com

Participate in my Healing + Embodiment Through Dance Online Course: www.rosegoldgoddesses.com/dance

Connect with Majo Malfino on instagram.com/majomolfino/ 

Order the book at https://majomolfino.com/book

Track your menstrual cycle and begin each day with peace, clarity + joy with my new A Yogic Path Reflective Journal, available here: https://amzn.to/2W8ZQu3

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose
